meanings.definition: To surpass in dreaming or imagination.
meanings.sent1: She always outdreams her friends with her wild imagination.
meanings.sent2: I love outdreaming about flying through the clouds.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to be outdreaming about catching a giant mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her outdreaming takes her to magical lands beyond reality.
meanings.sent5: Outdreaming allows us to explore endless possibilities in our minds.

meanings.definition: The act of dreaming more vividly or creatively than someone else.
meanings.sent1: His outdreaming often inspires others to think outside the box.
meanings.sent2: The competition was tough, but her outdreaming won her the prize.
meanings.sent3: The outdreaming of the children turned into a colorful storybook.
meanings.sent4: In the world of outdreaming, anything is possible and dreams come to life.
meanings.sent5: Her outdreaming was so vivid that it felt like living in a dream world.
